page.title: 18Employment
page.content: We did a survey on employment.We went round the classes and asked the children what their parents do for a job. More women seem to have a{part_time } job than men,but more men seem to have a{full_time}job than women. 35% of men and 45% of women have a part_time job. 95% men and 22% women do a full_time job.In most familes{both parents}work. Interestingly,there were quite a few men who had both a full and part-time job. The most common jobs were those involving{skilled work,health,navy}and {marine workers}.Most of the skilled workers work at Ford in Eastleigh. There are a lot of marine workers because we are near big rivers and the sea. { Unemployment}is quite low compared to some other areas.Only 3% of parents were unable to find employment.
